verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: Didn’t you see how your Lord dealt with the People of the Elephant?
Didn’t He make their plot in confusion?
He sent flocks of birds against them.
Pelting them with stones of hard clay.
And He made them like eaten-up stubble.
